contact.delete_ack: I understand that if there are no reference contacts left, the management may have difficulty delivering important information related to me to my closest person.
contact.delete_desc_fallback: You are about to delete this contact. This action cannot be undone.
contact.delete_desc_prefix: You are about to delete contact

dialog.desc: We won't share sensitive information. This data is used only when needed for your convenience and safety.

fields.address_hint: Optional. Fill if it helps us identify the address.
fields.name_hint: A person who agrees to be contacted when needed.
fields.phone_hint: Use an active number. It must be different from other reference contacts.

contact.title: Emergency Contacts

desc: Account summary. Use the Edit button per section to update.

alert.approved: Your document has been approved. If you re-upload, the document will be reviewed again by admin.
alert.file_picked: You selected a new document file. The document will be (re)reviewed by admin.
alert.pending: The current document status is pending. Your document is awaiting admin verification.
alert.rejected: Your document was rejected. You must re-upload the document for another review.

photo_hint: JPG/PNG up to 2MB. Square ratio recommended.
